descriptions: SEO promotion, website development and marketing strategies that deliver results. We work with clients throughout Kazakhstan: Almaty, Astana, Shymkent and other cities. Your success is our mission.
Professional digital agency with over 10 years of experience. We help businesses grow online through SEO, contextual advertising and development. We work online throughout Kazakhstan.

Comprehensive solutions for digital promotion of your business. From technical SEO to advertising campaign setup — everything for your company's growth. Clients from Almaty, Astana, Shymkent and other cities.
New agency with extensive team experience. We rank websites in search engines, create selling websites and set up effective advertising. Your growth is our goal.
Digital marketing that works. SEO optimization, website development, Google Ads and analytics. We work with companies throughout Kazakhstan and help achieve results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our work

response.question: How long does it take to respond to an application?
response.answer: We respond to all applications within 24 hours. We work every day, so you will receive a response quickly, regardless of the day of the week.

consultation.question: Do you provide free consultation?
consultation.answer: Yes, we provide free initial consultation for all potential clients. Fill out the form above, and we will contact you to discuss your project.

small.question: Do you work with small companies?
small.answer: Of course! We work with businesses of any scale — from startups to large corporations. For each client, we select the optimal solution taking into account budget and goals.

remote.question: How do you work remotely?
remote.answer: We work completely online, using modern tools for communication and project management. This allows us to be available to clients worldwide and work efficiently at any time.

experience.question: What is your work experience?
experience.answer: We are a young company, but our team has extensive experience in the digital sphere. Each of us has years of experience working with various projects where we achieved excellent results in promotion and business development.

services.question: What services do you provide?
services.answer: We provide a full range of digital services: SEO optimization, website development, Google Ads setup, marketing strategies, analytics and conversion growth. We can work both on individual areas and comprehensively.

price.question: How much does your work cost?
price.answer: The cost depends on the scope of work and project complexity. We offer an individual approach to each client and honest prices without hidden fees. Contact us for a personal quote.

start.question: How to start working with you?
start.answer: Simply fill out the form on this page or contact us by phone or email. We will conduct a free consultation, discuss your project and offer an optimal solution.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Step-by-step process of promoting your website

step1.title: Audit and Analysis
step1.description: We conduct a full technical audit of the site, analyze competitors, study the target audience and determine keywords for promotion.

step2.title: Strategy Development
step2.description: We create an individual promotion strategy taking into account the specifics of your business, competitive environment and project goals.

step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: We perform technical optimization, work with content, build link profile and launch local promotion.

step4.title: Monitoring and Optimization
step4.description: We constantly track results, analyze metrics and optimize work to achieve maximum efficiency.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About SEO
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about website promotion

q1.question: How long does it take for a website to reach the top of search engines?
q1.answer: First SEO optimization results are usually visible 3-6 months after starting work. Reaching top-10 for high-frequency queries can take 6-12 months. Speed depends on competition in your niche, current site condition and scope of work. We provide monthly progress reports.

q2.question: What is included in SEO promotion cost?
q2.answer: Cost depends on scope of work and project complexity. Basic package includes: technical audit, content optimization, meta tags work, internal linking, sitemap creation, analytics setup. Extended packages include link building, content marketing and regular reports. Contact us to calculate your project cost.

q3.question: Do you work with sites on different CMS (WordPress, 1C-Bitrix, OpenCart)?
q3.answer: Yes, we work with any CMS and platforms: WordPress, 1C-Bitrix, OpenCart, WooCommerce, Magento, as well as sites on pure HTML/CSS/JS. Our experience allows us to optimize sites of any complexity and technical implementation.

q4.question: Do you guarantee top-10 ranking?
q4.answer: We guarantee professional work and constant improvement of site positions. However, honest SEO specialists cannot guarantee specific positions, as search engine algorithms constantly change. We guarantee: regular work on the site, transparent reporting, organic traffic growth and position improvement for target queries. In addition, we provide a lifetime guarantee on all work performed — if problems arise, we will fix them for free.

q5.question: How do you track work results?
q5.answer: We use professional tools: Google Analytics, Yandex.Metrica, Google Search Console, Yandex.Webmaster, as well as specialized SEO tools. Every month you receive a detailed report with data on positions, traffic, conversions and work performed. All metrics are available in real time through a personal account.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Step-by-step process of setting up and managing advertising campaigns

step1.title: Analysis and Strategy
step1.description: We study your business, target audience and competitors. We determine campaign goals, budget and key metrics for tracking.

step2.title: Campaign Setup
step2.description: We create campaign structure, select keywords, write ads and set up targeting on target audience.

step3.title: Launch and Testing
step3.description: We launch campaigns and conduct A/B testing of ads. We collect data for further optimization.

step4.title: Optimization and Scaling
step4.description: We constantly analyze results, adjust bids, improve ads and scale successful campaigns for maximum ROI.

cta.title: Ready to launch advertising?
cta.subtitle: Get a free consultation and budget calculation for your campaign

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our services and work process

q1.question: How long does it take for a website to reach the top of search engines?
q1.answer: First SEO optimization results are usually visible 3-6 months after starting work. Reaching top-10 for high-frequency queries can take 6-12 months. Speed depends on competition in your niche, current site condition and scope of work. We provide monthly progress reports.

q2.question: What is included in SEO promotion cost?
q2.answer: Cost depends on scope of work and project complexity. Basic package includes: technical audit, content optimization, meta tags work, internal linking, sitemap creation, analytics setup. Extended packages include link building, content marketing and regular reports. Contact us to calculate your project cost.

q3.question: Do you guarantee top-10 ranking?
q3.answer: We guarantee professional work and constant improvement of site positions. However, honest SEO specialists cannot guarantee specific positions, as search engine algorithms constantly change. We guarantee: regular work on the site, transparent reporting, organic traffic growth and position improvement for target queries. In addition, we provide a lifetime guarantee on all work performed — if problems arise, we will fix them for free.

q1.question: How long does website development take?
q1.answer: Development time depends on project complexity. A landing page can be created in 1-2 weeks, a corporate website — in 3-6 weeks, an online store — in 6-12 weeks. We always agree on deadlines at the planning stage and meet deadlines.

q2.question: Can changes be made after site launch?
q2.answer: Yes, of course! We provide a lifetime guarantee on all our work. If problems arise or improvements are needed, we will fix them for free. We also offer support and content update services.

q1.question: How much does advertising campaign setup cost?
q1.answer: Setup cost depends on campaign complexity and number of keywords. Basic setup costs from 15,000 tenge, comprehensive campaign — from 50,000 tenge. We also take a percentage of advertising budget for campaign management. Use our calculator for preliminary calculation.

q2.question: When will first results appear?
q2.answer: Advertising starts working immediately after campaign launch. First clicks and applications usually appear within the first days. We constantly optimize the campaign to improve results and reduce cost per click.

q1.question: Do you work with clients from other cities?
q1.answer: Yes, we work online worldwide. All communications are conducted via internet: video calls, messengers, email. We successfully work with clients from different cities in Kazakhstan and other countries.

q2.question: How does payment work?
q2.answer: We accept payment by bank transfer, card or through payment systems. For large projects, payment in stages is possible: 50% prepayment, the rest after completion. All details are discussed individually.

q3.question: Do you provide guarantees?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide a lifetime guarantee on all our work. If problems arise with the website or promotion, we will fix them for free. We also provide 6 months of free support to first clients.

developer.description: We need a developer to create modern websites and web applications. Work with PHP, JavaScript, HTML/CSS. Knowledge of frameworks is welcome.

ads.description: We are looking for a specialist to set up and manage advertising campaigns in Google Ads and Yandex.Direct. Experience with analytics is required.

howToApply.title: How to Apply for a Vacancy?

step1.title: Fill Out Form
step1.description: Go to the contacts page and fill out the form, indicating in the message which vacancy you are applying for.

step2.title: Attach Resume
step2.description: In the message, provide a link to your resume or describe your work experience and skills.

step3.title: Wait for Response
step3.description: We will review your application and contact you within 1-2 business days to discuss details.

cta.title: Didn't Find a Suitable Vacancy?
